# ReadyStates

**Static Property**

A static property that allows you to access the Look Around ready state.

## Declaration

```swift
static ReadyStates: typeof LookAroundReadyState;
```

## Discussion

Use this object to access the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/LookAroundReadyState] enumeration with `mapkit.LookAround.ReadyStates`.
title: ReadyStates
